> On the opposite side of the holographic map, her optics focused 
from the the 
> map to him. Watching him a moment. "Hmmm... a precautionary 
measure. How... 
> ingenius."

"Better is prevent, my dear Maxima "said Hydras "Loyal Decepticons 
and Predancons are scarse"


> Obviously there were some files here in ths database that he 
didn't want 
> anyone to know about. Either him or his previous forms. 
> 
> Her optics danced across the map again. "Have the crashed Autobot 
& 
> Decepticon crafts been discovered yet?" she wanted to know the 
extent of how 
> much he & the others knew.


"Not yet"replied Hydras while he walked towaRDS Maxima"When I found 
the Ark... I'll destroy Maximals FOREVER"
